articles.title: Angie Kent Reveals Why She Unfollowed Carlin & Breaks Her Silence On Split Rumours - Hit 107
articles.description: We're so confuuused
articles.content:
There's been rumours circulating that The Bacheloette's Angie Kent and her chosen suitor, Carlin Sterritt, have split!
It's been a confusing time trying to figure it out. You see, the pair unfollowe… [+562 chars]
